parameters.definition: Units of vitamins provided by a serving of vegetables
Units of minerals provided by a serving of vegetables
Units of vitamins provided by a serving of fruits
Units of minerals provided by a serving of fruits
Cost of one serving of vegetables
Cost of one serving of fruits

description: A man only eats vegetables and fruits. A serving of vegetables contains \param{VitVeg} units of vitamins and \param{MinVeg} units of minerals. A serving of fruit contains \param{VitFruit} units of vitamins and \param{MinFruit} units of minerals. He wants to eat at least \param{MinVit} units of vitamins and \param{MinMin} units of minerals. If vegetables cost \param{CostVeg} per serving and fruits cost \param{CostFruit} per serving, how many servings of each should he eat to minimize his cost?
